scripts.test:api: docker-compose -p test-api -f docker-compose.test.yml build && docker-compose -p test-api -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm api; exitcode=$?; docker-compose -p test-api -f docker-compose.test.yml down; exit ${exitcode}
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:front-admin && npm run build:front && npm run build:package
scripts.build:api: cd api && npm i && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:front-admin: cd front-admin && npm i && npm i --dev && npm run build && mv dist ../api/dist/front-admin && cd ..
scripts.build:front: cd front && npm i && npm i --dev && npm run build && mv dist ../api/dist/front && cd ..
scripts.deploy:production: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.production.yml build && rm -rf images-docker && mkdir images-docker && docker save -o ./images-docker/api_production api_production:latest
